snippet: The allegations involved three underage girls, a United Nations official said.
abstract: United Nations announces investigation into new reports of UN peacekeepers sexually abusing three underage girls in Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: The allegations involved three underage girls, a United Nations official said.

headline.main: New Accusations About Sexual Abuse in Central African Republic Prompt Inquiry
headline.print_headline: United Nations; New Accusations About Sexual Abuse Prompt Investigation of Peacekeepers
